Reviews.Title: “Rip-off. AVOID.”
Reviews.Author: Kurt2010
Reviews.Content: decided day trip vancouver booked 2 doublebed wife son saturday morning arrived 8pm check informed 2 double bed gone paying reservation desk clerk told shed king bed foldout sofa price favor lobby converted storage lighting nauseating storage facility wife bar soap found hair inside soap bars ceiling bed industrial tape holding ac badly damaged lacking labels desk clerk bar soap settings proficient english couldnt explain sliding door reveal left lumber industrial machine confirming storage unit extension cords someones apartment bed uncomfortable didnt fold sofa else skeevy cost 136 money im couldve found accommodations bit money hotel class

Reviews.Title: “Not a luxury hotel, but what a bargain for Vancouver!”

Reviews.Content: location little offputting travelodge sits tight little lot vietnamese restaurant dennys sign road yes sparkling hotel paid 79 night deal furnishings little beat clean internet flawlessly inroom coffee plus coffee 24 hours day lobby breakfast provided 20 percent discount dennys getting vancouver lions gate bridge easy drive grab bus passes 10 minutes marine drive quay seabus bay pleased
